title: Chair, "Relief", 2008
provenance: Gift of  the designer, Ben K. Mickus; chair has been with him and his studio Mickus Projects since its creation.
description: Stacked layers of cut wool felt laminated with water-based glue to form a solid form of set-back layers on four stainless steel legs set at angles to the upright rectangular outline of the chair.

tombstone.epitaph: Chair, "Relief", 2008. Wool felt, stainless steel. Gift of Ben K. Mickus. 2009-21-1.
